low.desc: Noticeable pulse jitter at the beat level; uneven spacing across bars.

mid.desc: Mostly steady pulse with minor fluctuations; generally locked to the beat.

high.desc: Consistently steady pulse across bars; metronomic without rigidity.

low.desc: Notes are overly detached or overly overlapped vs. score intent; inconsistent lengths.

mid.desc: Generally appropriate note lengths with occasional mismatch to score phrasing.

high.desc: Realized durations match score intent closely; crisp legato/staccato where appropriate.

low.desc: Blurred harmony; excessive sustain obscures inner voices and bass clarity.

mid.desc: Pedal mostly supportive; occasional blur on fast harmonic changes.

high.desc: Clean harmonic transitions; sympathetic resonance controlled; voices remain distinct.

low.desc: Narrow loudness span; little contrast between soft and loud passages.

mid.desc: Moderate contrast; dynamic shaping is present but could be broader.

high.desc: Wide expressive span from true piano to forte; controlled crescendi/decrescendi.

low.desc: Phrase breaks feel abrupt; breath-line is unclear or chopped.

mid.desc: Mostly continuous phrasing with occasional awkward break points.

high.desc: Clear long-line; phrase connections are natural and cohesive throughout.
